attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Born and raised in Italy emigrated to Canada to start a new life at the age of 25 now going strong in the pastaaaa....
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Zara'sPasta was founded by Giovanni (John) Zara in 1987. Giovanni Zara was born in northern Italy, the region world renown for its excellent food and wine. Now, you too can share in his love for the taste of real Italian cuisine. Unique pasta recipes used to prepare Zara's pasta and sauces were passed from generation to generation and saved as a family treasure. Thanks to this authentic, home-made touch and the unwavering commitment to the highest quality products, Zara's Pasta has become known as the producer of the most delicious fresh pasta in Vancouver.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Fresh frozen italian style pasta, just like home made according to my Mamma recipe.
Add to that fresh and frozen italian style pasta sauces.
We also are the first commercially gluten free pasta makers in Canada, sold in all SaveOnFoods PriceSmart and other Overweitea stores, on the natural food section of their freezer. We only manufacture and whole sale to distributors for multi restaurant chains,  supermarkets and stores like Granville Island Zara's Italian Deli and Bosa Foods, etc.....
Buon Appetito.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Sisters Jennie and Jessie Trakulthongroj have owned and operated the Pad Thai Restaurant in Pitt Meadows, BC since 1999.

Jennie and Jessie moved from their native Thailand to pursue their culinary and business educations. After school, they decided to immigrate permanently to Canada to build on their newly developed expertise and passion for authentic Thai Cuisine.

Pad Thai Restaurant has since developed into a mainstay dining establishment in Pitt Meadows with a loyal following and a dedicated staff.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We offer several Thai dishes that have grown to become familiar in the West. Our Thai Curry excites your taste buds with a rich and fragrant curry of meats, poultry, shellfish, curry paste, fresh herbs and coconut milk while our Tom Yum Koong spices things up with hot Thai chilies, palm sugar, galangal, kaffir lime leaves and lemongrass.

Our house signature Pad Thai made of rice noodles stir fried with prawns, egg, peanut, pressed tofu, bean sprout, tamarind, sugar and spices will undoubtedly turn you into another regular patron of Pad Thai Restaurant.
Ashley Business owner

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Founded in 2005 at Hastings and Richards Street in downtown Vancouver, Waves has been blazing the trail for with superbly fresh brewed coffee, a commitment to local craftsmanship and community, and incomparable service.
In 2008, we were recognized by the Brand Coaches as the Hottest Brand in Canada. We have also been recognized as the Best of Brands by over 1,500 coffee retailers.
Today there are 38 Waves across British Columbia and Alberta and with more to come you'll be sure to ride the Waves with us sometime soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.
Coffee, Tea, Frappe, Iced Drinks, Sandwiches, and Pastries.

name: Ban Chok Dee Thai Cuisine-Maple Ridge

about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: Our other (original) location in Langley, BC!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Owner and Executive Chef, Parinya, has been cooking Thai food from a very young age when she preapared meals for her family in Thailand and sold hot food on the street in front of her house. She has a passion and talent for Thai food, arts and culture and enjoyed sharing this with her friends and family. And now, she is able to share this passion with her customers at Ban Chok Dee Thai Cuisine. She can be seen running between the kitchen and the customers to make sure everything is just right!

She enjoys cooking, fruit and vegetable carving, decorating and flower arrangements, and loves to share these skills with others, whether it is through the dining experience at the restaurant; catering for a wedding or party; or directly through the cooking and carving classes that she offers.

In addition to Parinya, our current chefs all bring many years of experience cooking in the restaurants of Thailand and share Parinya's passion for food.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Ban Chok Dee Thai Cuisine opened in the summer of 2009 and is locally owned and operated. The owner, Parinya, moved to Canada from Thailand in 1998 and is committed to providing authentic, great tasting Thai food with traditional & friendly Thai service.

Starting out on 203 Street in Langley with 5 staff, we moved a new location on Douglas Crescent in Langley in the summer of 2012 and now have around 15 employees and seating for up to 120 guests.

In June 2016, we opened up a 2nd location in Maple Ridge offering the same great food and services.

We have been voted one of the Best Thai Restaurants in Langley since 2011 by the readers of the Langley Times and Langley Advance, and we were the first restaurant in Langley to have been awarded the Thai Select designation which is determined by the Thailand Department of International Trade Promotion.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We offer award winning Thai Cuisine!! Our selection of wine pairs wonderfully with Thai Cuisine with selection from all across the world we work hard to combine the very best selection of wine with our delicious food. Creating a lasting award winning experience is what we strive for everyday. Please join us tonight and see for yourself a true taste of Thailand.
Whether you're dining around our table or yours, make every occasion a special one. Visit our website to book your table or order takeout online.

Located conveniently in between Pitt Meadows & Maple Ridge, British Columbia, The Loft envelops the breathtaking views & sunsets overlooking Golden Ears Mountains as well as our championship 18 hole golf course. The contemporary downtown west coast feel invites you to sit back, relax with friends and enjoy drinks and delicious food. Whether it’s an intimate dinner for two, or just entertaining a group of friends, the Loft combines the best local ingredients with friendly, personalized service to deliver outstanding experiences…to perfection. attributes.about_this_biz_history: Conceived over time and launched by Scotty Morison in 2004, the Browns Socialhouse Franchise concept was developed in light of a singular vision: to do more...with less. Browns Socialhouse wasn't developed through data analysis; it's real, experiential and intuitive. It's driven by extremely high expectations from the Franchisor, Browns Restaurant Group. And it puts Franchisees front-and-centre, because we know that a Franchisor can only set and support the "bar" - it's Franchisees that truly deliver the goods to Guests.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We keep things simple. That's a big part of our business model. It's why we use a one-page menu. It's why we stick to a "4-Walls" philosophy when it comes to building the Brand in local communities. It's why our Culinary Development Program focuses on recipes with broad appeal, not "niche" menu items. And it's why we use similar design elements in all Socialhouses.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Brian Chin, born in Kingston, Jamaica, enjoyed an early life in Port Royal, relishing sun-soaked beaches, simple joys by the harbor, and the legacy of Fort Charles. Relocating to Canada at six for better education, his family's culinary ties led to their ownership of Hibiscus Foods, known for delightful Jamaican patties. Despite studying marine biology, Brian took over the business in 2013, rebranding as Morgan's Harbour in 2019. He preserves his uncle's legacy, infusing it with innovation and a deep passion for crafting exquisite Jamaican patties.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Morgan's Harbour offers an authentic Jamaican Patty experience in BC, inspired by Port Royal near Jamaica's capital. Committed to crafting exceptional Patties, we reject shortcuts for true flavour. Our artisanal approach revives the past's rich patty flavours lost to mass production. Using traditional methods and quality ingredients, we deliver a classic indulgence. With new ownership in 2013 came innovation, refining ingredients, removing preservatives, and introducing a remarkable Vegan patty. Every bite of a Morgan's Harbour patty blends the best of then and now, inviting you to savour a genuine Jamaican moment.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Free deliveries for Jamaican Meals and frozen Jamaican Patties on Wednesdays. Curbside pickups available from Wednesdays to Fridays between 11:00 am and 4:00 pm.

Indulge in the vibrant flavours of the Caribbean with our mouthwatering Jamaican Meals and Patties! At Morgans Harbour, we bring the spirit of Jamaica straight to your plate. From our rich and savoury Jerk Chicken to the delightful spice of our Curry Chicken, and the hearty goodness of our Oxtail, our Jamaican Meals capture the essence of the island's culinary traditions. And don't miss out on our irresistible Jamaican Patties, available in a variety of flavours that dance with authentic Caribbean spices. Whether you're craving a hearty meal or a quick snack, our Jamaican cuisine is a journey for your taste buds that you won't want to miss. Come savour the Caribbean with Morgans Harbour today!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our story began in an RV, our little traveling home in which we, and our two wonderful cat-kids, moved all the way from QC to BC, which was a sublime experience! Through this journey, our fascination for adventure in nature, accompanied with our passion about veganism, made us realize how our life-changing transition to veganism is strikingly similar to this adventurous tour that brought us to this beautiful, exhilarating and colorful piece of earth that we now call home. That was our epiphany, the moment that ‘Rvegan Tour’ was born of our vegan tour.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Sisters Jennie and Jessie Trakulthongroj have owned and operated the Pad Thai Restaurant in Pitt Meadows, BC since 1999.

Jennie and Jessie moved from their native Thailand to pursue their culinary and business educations. After school, they decided to immigrate permanently to Canada to build on their newly developed expertise and passion for authentic Thai Cuisine.

Pad Thai Restaurant has since developed into a mainstay dining establishment in Pitt Meadows with a loyal following and a dedicated staff.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We offer several Thai dishes that have grown to become familiar in the West. Our Thai Curry excites your taste buds with a rich and fragrant curry of meats, poultry, shellfish, curry paste, fresh herbs and coconut milk while our Tom Yum Koong spices things up with hot Thai chilies, palm sugar, galangal, kaffir lime leaves and lemongrass.

Our house signature Pad Thai made of rice noodles stir fried with prawns, egg, peanut, pressed tofu, bean sprout, tamarind, sugar and spices will undoubtedly turn you into another regular patron of Pad Thai Restaurant.
Ashley Business owner

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Some 30 years ago, Leroy Earl Fuller and his son Stanley Earl Fuller had a simple idea: a laid-back burger & beer joint. When the restaurant started, there was no question about what the name would be. It had to be called Earls. The restaurant quickly took off because, well, who would say no to burgers & beer? So they hired talented people and travelled the world to taste, drink and get inspired. Then they came back and applied all of that to the menu. And with that came attention and awards and even more talented people. A lot has changed since those early days. But Earls is still a family business. And itïs filled with people who are genuinely passionate about great food and drinks served in an inviting environment.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: A sleek, sophisticated dining experience shared in a modern + inviting setting. attributes.about_this_biz_history:
The founders created a name and logo that reflected the signature menu items--the fish tacos and Mission style burritos they had fallen in love with during their college surfer days in California.

In the early 80's, the Mission style burrito began to appear in small shops around San Francisco, and the popularity exploded from there. Now, as far as fish tacos are concerned...

It all started improbably in San Diego sometime in the late 60's when a surfer group went in search of the perfect wave. They headed south of the border. After riding the waves all morning, they made the trek back up the cliffs and discovered the local taco: fried fish, shredded cabbage, a squeeze of lime, salsa and the mystery white sauce. It was a popular staple food served throughout the border towns of the Mexican-California border.

It was decided that the marriage of the Mission style burrito and Seattle's renowned seafood would be a natural. A great decision!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The TACO DEL MAR® menu offers a fast, fun and delicious alternative to traditional Mexican food. We feature large, hand-rolled Baja Burritos and rippin' fish tacos made to order just the way you want them. The service is fast, the people are enthusiastic, and the restaurants are inspired by beach culture. So grab your surfboard and let's head out to grab the next wave together!

Ask us about our Gluten-Free menu!

That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.

So they hired talented people and travelled the world to taste, drink and get inspired. Then they came back and applied all of that to the menu. And with that came attention and awards and even more talented people. A lot has changed since those early days. But Earls is still a family business. And itïs filled with people who are genuinely passionate about great food and drinks served in an inviting environment.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
The founders created a name and logo that reflected the signature menu items--the fish tacos and Mission style burritos they had fallen in love with during their college surfer days in California.

In the early 80's, the Mission style burrito began to appear in small shops around San Francisco, and the popularity exploded from there. Now, as far as fish tacos are concerned...

It all started improbably in San Diego sometime in the late 60's when a surfer group went in search of the perfect wave. They headed south of the border. After riding the waves all morning, they made the trek back up the cliffs and discovered the local taco: fried fish, shredded cabbage, a squeeze of lime, salsa and the mystery white sauce. It was a popular staple food served throughout the border towns of the Mexican-California border.

It was decided that the marriage of the Mission style burrito and Seattle's renowned seafood would be a natural. A great decision!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The TACO DEL MAR® menu offers a fast, fun and delicious alternative to traditional Mexican food. We feature large, hand-rolled Baja Burritos and rippin' fish tacos made to order just the way you want them. The service is fast, the people are enthusiastic, and the restaurants are inspired by beach culture. So grab your surfboard and let's head out to grab the next wave together!

Ask us about our Gluten-Free menu!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Brian Chin, born in Kingston, Jamaica, enjoyed an early life in Port Royal, relishing sun-soaked beaches, simple joys by the harbor, and the legacy of Fort Charles. Relocating to Canada at six for better education, his family's culinary ties led to their ownership of Hibiscus Foods, known for delightful Jamaican patties. Despite studying marine biology, Brian took over the business in 2013, rebranding as Morgan's Harbour in 2019. He preserves his uncle's legacy, infusing it with innovation and a deep passion for crafting exquisite Jamaican patties.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Morgan's Harbour offers an authentic Jamaican Patty experience in BC, inspired by Port Royal near Jamaica's capital. Committed to crafting exceptional Patties, we reject shortcuts for true flavour. Our artisanal approach revives the past's rich patty flavours lost to mass production. Using traditional methods and quality ingredients, we deliver a classic indulgence. With new ownership in 2013 came innovation, refining ingredients, removing preservatives, and introducing a remarkable Vegan patty. Every bite of a Morgan's Harbour patty blends the best of then and now, inviting you to savour a genuine Jamaican moment.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Free deliveries for Jamaican Meals and frozen Jamaican Patties on Wednesdays. Curbside pickups available from Wednesdays to Fridays between 11:00 am and 4:00 pm.

Indulge in the vibrant flavours of the Caribbean with our mouthwatering Jamaican Meals and Patties! At Morgans Harbour, we bring the spirit of Jamaica straight to your plate. From our rich and savoury Jerk Chicken to the delightful spice of our Curry Chicken, and the hearty goodness of our Oxtail, our Jamaican Meals capture the essence of the island's culinary traditions. And don't miss out on our irresistible Jamaican Patties, available in a variety of flavours that dance with authentic Caribbean spices. Whether you're craving a hearty meal or a quick snack, our Jamaican cuisine is a journey for your taste buds that you won't want to miss. Come savour the Caribbean with Morgans Harbour today!

They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our story began in an RV, our little traveling home in which we, and our two wonderful cat-kids, moved all the way from QC to BC, which was a sublime experience! Through this journey, our fascination for adventure in nature, accompanied with our passion about veganism, made us realize how our life-changing transition to veganism is strikingly similar to this adventurous tour that brought us to this beautiful, exhilarating and colorful piece of earth that we now call home. That was our epiphany, the moment that ‘Rvegan Tour’ was born of our vegan tour.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Rvegan Tour we offer 100% plant-based, vegan, pre-packaged, ready to eat foods that add vareity to your meals. Our foods are versatile, easy, convenient, inherently gluten free, and healthy. Great for environment and definitly better for animals too.
